articles.author: Eamon Dillon & Nicola Tallant
articles.title: Kinahan Cartel used African air ambulances to move cocaine into Europe - Sunday World
articles.description: The Kinahan mob moved cocaine across Africa in air ambulances, bought off officials for use of landing strips and took control of the key transport route to Europe making the Irish mob second only in importance to the Colombian Cartels.
articles.content: The Kinahan mob moved cocaine across Africa in air ambulances, bought off officials for use of landing strips and took control of the key transport route to Europe making the Irish mob second only in… [+36 chars]

articles.title: Europe heatwave: Deadly wildfires spread in Mediterranean - BBC
articles.description: A firefighting pilot dies in Portugal and a big fire spreads near Spain's Costa del Sol.

articles.title: Thousands forced from homes as fires rage across Europe - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Fire season has hit parts of Europe earlier than usual this year after an unusually dry, hot spring that left the soil parched and which authorities attribute to climate change.
articles.content: Paris: Strong winds and hot, dry weather are frustrating French firefighters efforts to contain a huge wildfire that has raced across pine forests in the Bordeaux region for a fifth straight day, one… [+1942 chars]

articles.title: Heat wave in Europe: 'National emergency' in UK as historic temps forecast and wildfires rage - USA TODAY
